bibl.title: Final Report for the Fifteenth Field Season of the Theban Desert Road Survey.
bibl.note: See in part. p. 98: Other Inscription Sites in the Wadi Nag el-Birka. Mentions several new inscriptions, demotic and Coptic [incorporating cryptographic elements in the case of the Coptic inscriptions (fig. 4)].

bibl.title: Annales du Service des antiquités d'Égypte

bibl.seg: John Coleman Darnell, Final Report for the Fifteenth Field Season of the Theban Desert Road Survey.

See in part. p. 98: Other Inscription Sites in the Wadi Nag el-Birka. Mentions several new inscriptions, demotic and Coptic [incorporating cryptographic elements in the case of the Coptic inscriptions (fig. 4)].
